Detailed Description

Key bindings for vgui_shell_tableau.

The events are

  • quit (Alt-Q), which exits the application
  • close (Alt-W), which closes the window (and exits the application if there is only one window)

The set_default_* member functions can be used to change the default bindings for all future shell tableaux. It will not change the bindings of already created tableaux.
